alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 4:29AM EST until January 13 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT TO NOON CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of blowing and drifting snow expected, mainly in open areas. Additional snow accumulations this morning less than one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...In Illinois, Iroquois and Ford Counties. In Indiana, Newton, Jasper, and Benton Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CST today. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from midnight CST tonight to noon CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on locally slippery road conditions, mainly in open areas. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. In Illinois, the latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Indiana, the latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1-800-261-7623.
